backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing a feature request involving updating the HeroSection to use a new logo asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend landing page components and marketing config updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML shell defining meta tags and loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the full landing page by rendering all major sections in order.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Consultation booking section with Calendly CTA and supporting text.
Displays three case studies with metrics and implemented changes using cards.
Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname.
Hero section with background image, updated CCPG logo, headline, credentials, and CTA button.
Offer section promoting conversion optimization services with benefit blocks and CTA.
Outlines a four-step optimization process using cards and short descriptions.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Exports marketing constants including Calendly URL, tagline, and company credential strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, and utility classes for status colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and extended utilities tied to CSS variable-driven design.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requirements, and image assets for the hero logo update.
